trainings.title: ITS and Safe System Approach
trainings.description: An overview of how intelligent transportation systems (ITS) align with the Safe System Approach (SSA) - a guiding framework to enhance safety on our surface transportation system.

trainings.title: ITS and Safer People
trainings.description: Leveraging intelligent transportation systems (ITS) to promote responsible driving behavior and create road conditions that prioritize every traveler's safety.

trainings.title: ITS and Safer Vehicles
trainings.description: Applying intelligent transportation systems (ITS) technologies to broaden in-vehicle safety features that prevent crashes and reduce their severity for occupants and bystanders.

trainings.title: ITS and Safer Speeds
trainings.description: Explore how ITS technology can be used to encourage drivers to comply with posted speed limits, dynamically set speed limits based on travel conditions, or enforce posted speed limits.

trainings.title: ITS and Safer Roads
trainings.description: Using intelligent transportation systems (ITS)-driven roadway designs to compensate for human error, encourage safer behaviors, and protect the most vulnerable users.

trainings.title: ITS and Post-Crash Care
trainings.description: Enhancing survivability and responder safety by integrating intelligent transportation systems (ITS) into rapid emergency access and comprehensive traffic incident management.

trainings.title: The Principles of Systems Engineering
trainings.description: An accessible overview of systems engineering's foundations, spotlighting concept of operations, requirements management, system architecture, and lifecycle verification.

trainings.title: Applying Systems Engineering to ITS Projects
trainings.description: Examining why applying systems engineering accelerates integration, enhances safety, and ensures scalable, resilient intelligent transportation systems (ITS) solutions.

trainings.title: Systems Engineering Approach Resources
trainings.description: Showcasing essential standards, tools, and learning platforms to build systems engineering expertise for successful intelligent transportation systems (ITS) implementations.
